features: 👚【Note: it is a mini washer but not a dryer.】

👚【Larger Than Others】 Our mini portable washing machine is larger when unfolded 27*27*20cm,Folded size:27×14x20cm, towels, socks or other small items,,It is healthier to wash intimate clothing separately. The mini washer is not a replacement for a large washing machine。
👚【Folding Design】Mini Portable Washing Machine bucket design,easy to store when not in use. Easily fits under a stool or bed without taking up too much space in your home.

👚【Easy to Use】One button to control the washing machine, easy to use, just touch the button for two seconds to start the washing machine, which is very suitable for washing childrens clothing, underwear, socks, towels, etc.effectively remove dirt,and make your clothes clean.

👚【Please Note】 Our mini portable washing machine is designed for delicate and small things. Its small load can save water and electricity, but cleaning large items may damage the machine. The drain basket of our mini washing machine can make your items without dripping and avoid hand-twisting, but it can't completely dry the clothes.
👚【SAFE AND ENERGY SAVING】Portable washer machine using TPE and food grade silicone material is a great choice for your personal items, baby items, patients' families!
body.description: Note: it is a mini washer but not a dryer. This folding portable washing machine has a mini size and mini capacityonly,It can wash baby clothes, underwear, towels, socks or other small items,,It is healthier to wash intimate clothing separately. The mini washer is not a replacement for a large washing machine Instructions: 👚Place the laundry in the wash tub and add an appropriate amount of detergent. 👚Add the appropriate amount of water (we recommend that the water level be 3-5 cm higher than the laundry so that the water completely covers the laundry). 👚Place the lid on the wash tub, turn on the mini washer's timer and switch it to the "10min" position, and the washer will begin automatic operation. 👚When the program is finished, the timer will automatically reset and the equipment will stop. 👚Remove the laundry. 👚Disconnect the adapter from the washing machine and the power outlet. 👚Select the appropriate drainage method to drain the water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hoping it lasts
reviews.reviewText: I've only used it four times. It does get clothes clean and is easy to use, but I gave up on the spin basket. It just wobbles bad or comes off. I end up wringing things out by hand to fighting with it to work. The best part is it's easy to operate and the clothes do get clean. I can only fit one tshirt in at a time. If it lasts, I will consider it a good buy. The seller and delivery were fine. No problem with that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's wobbling in my video video because it is missing a suction cup, it came with three but was suppose to come with four. The cleaning cycle works great but the draining cycle, I can not tell you because it wobbles so much that I had to turn it off. Maybe it's because I'm missing a suction. I feel like it would do good. This is easy to operate and is great for washing under garments or just one piece of adult clothing, you might can fit two children's. I like how it is collapsible. I am giving this a 4 star rating because mine came with that small missing part (suction cup) that was important with the whole process of washing and draining the clothes. I will try to find some suctions that fit but not only that but maybe or a little bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a piece of crap
reviews.reviewText: Washed 2 pair of panties, when I got through, I was wet, the kitchen was wet, the counter was wet, the cap for the plug wouldn’t fit back on the spout, water shot all over. Tried it again today, read the instructions (again—about the 5th Time ,)turned iton, ran 10 seconds and shut off, and wouldn’t start again. I swill be sending it back and look for something made in USA with instructions that aren’t in Chinese!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and I love it!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have never been more doubtful of a product than this Portable Washing Machine.Super easy to use, very light weight and it does the job. I do not mean you can do all your laundry here but definitely you can wash delicate up to two blouses at the same time. I also use it to wash my husband shorts that he uses to work outside on the yard and they came out clean. Perfect to take on car trips if you have children and do not want to carry too many shirts, socks or underwear. I wish the time settings were a little longer but not a big deal. Definitely is a nice addition especially on trips. I absolutely recommend it!!!!
